  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    play.templates.GroovyTemplate.ExecutableTemplate._(String)
    '_' should not be used as an identifier, since it is a reserved keyword from source level 1.8 on use GroovyTemplate.ExecutableTemplate.__loadClass(java.lang.String) instead
    play.mvc.Http.Request._init()
    play.data.binding.Binder.bind(Object, String, Map<String, String[]>)

    play.PlayPlugin.bind(String, Object, Map<String, String[]>)
    play.test.BaseTest.clearJPASession()
    play.PlayPlugin.compileAll(List<ApplicationClasses.ApplicationClass>)
    play.plugins.PluginCollection.compileAll(List<ApplicationClasses.ApplicationClass>)
    play.test.Fixtures.deleteAll()
    use Fixtures.deleteDatabase() instead
    play.db.jpa.GenericModel.edit(String, Map<String, String[]>)
    play.db.jpa.FileAttachment.exists()

    use retrieveAccessToken() instead

    use retrieveRequestToken() instead

    play.data.parsing.MultipartStream()
